answerText: Sizwe Banzi is Dead[10] This other play by the author of Sizwe Bansi is Dead sees a white teenager, who is sometimes called Hally, lash out at his two black servants Willie and Sam upon hearing that his father is returning from the hospital.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 3 | 9 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This play opens with the photographer Styles remembering how the workers at a factory were given new uniforms and instructed to sing when Henry Ford Jr. visited them. For 10 points each: [10] Name this 1972 play which sees the title character assume the identity of Robert Zwelinzima in order to find work in Port Elizabeth.
